title: [K-12] Graduate Social Science Simulation Education Utilizing Information Literacy Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and experience utilizing academic resources
context.additional_context: Information evaluation and utilization competency enhancement program for graduate-level social science research.

learning_goals: Learners can apply academic database search strategies with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can evaluate the credibility of information sources based on three criteria: author background, publisher, and recency.
Learners achieve level 4 or higher on a 5-point scale in self-assessing their information literacy improvement via a survey.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
